title: I can't open up LoL because it says that bugsplat.dll is missing from my computer?

replies.body:
Hey there,

if you're still experiencing this issue please try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6), let me know if this helps.
